page.title: 03THEALE BY-PASS
page.content: The Theale by-pass allows access to and from the M4(Junction 12) and the main Reading road. The by-pass was built to reduce the number of vehicles travelling through Theale village. 762 vehicles went onto the Theale by-pass from the roundabout. 18 had come from Wigmore Lane, 480 from the A4(Thatcham), 245 from the A340, 11 from the A4(Theale) and 8 had gone once round the roundabout. 522 vehicles went onto the roundabout from the Theale by-pass. 29 went to Wigmore Lane, 270 wto the A4(Thatcham), 195 to the A340, 20 to the A4(Theale) and 8 had gone once round the roundabout. The Theale by-pass has been effective in removing the through traffic from Theale village. At present the roundabout can cope effectively with the traffic even during the times of peak usage.
